mapper.insert: insert into tb_apply(user_id, recruit_id, company_id, company_name, recruit_address, update_time, salary) values (#{userId}, #{recruitId}, #{companyId}, #{companyName}, #{recruitAddress}, #{updateTime}, #{salary})
mapper.select: select r.* from tb_apply a join tb_recruit r on a.company_id = r.company_id and a.recruit_id = r.recruit_id where user_id = #{userId}
